price: Na Mtume alikuwa akisema: Ee Mola wangu Mlezi! Hakika watu wangu wameifanya hii Qur'ani ni kihame.
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوۡمِي ٱتَّخَذُواْ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مَهۡجُورٗا
footnotes: Na Mtume alisema akimshitakia Mwenyezi Mungu kwa taabu anazo zipata kwa watu wake: Hakika hawa wameiacha Qur'ani na wameihama, na wameshikilia katika kuipuuza, na kuifanyia inda na uadui.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-rasūlu yārabbi inna qawmī ittakhadhū hādhā al-qur'āna mahjūran
